entry.tran: （绘画、雕塑等）与真人（或实物）一样大小的
entry.def: A life-size representation of someone or something, for example a painting or sculpture, is the same size as the person or thing that they represent.

example.ex: ...a life-size statue of an Indian boy.
example.tran: 与真人一样大的印度男孩雕像

means.word_mean: 1. being of the same size as an original;
